name: Manas AI
slogan: Helping businesses increase their customer retention with our AI powered platform
description:
We make retention simple.

For every individual customer, we identify and predict the retention risk and individual drivers of the risk. This means, you can build very personalised and effective campaign to save each customer.

Higher retention means customer growth, lower costs and higher margin.

team.name: Taraka Pavan Varma Alluri
team.bioHtml: Building Machine learning & Deep learning powered applications.

team.name: Rahul Chakkara
team.bioHtml: Founder, CEO and Advisor • @p&G, @BBC @TalkTalk

team.title: Co-Founder & CEO
team.name: Rahul Chakkara
team.bioHtml: Founder, CEO and Advisor • @p&G, @BBC @TalkTalk

jobs.title: Lead Generation Specialist
jobs.description:
• Develop a strong pipeline of clients among B2C customers in UK/ Europe, targeting sales & retention executives. We are targeting B2C customers across sectors
• Identify and secure meetings with new clients in UK/ Europe
• Develop and maintain relationship within the B2C ecosystem
• Attendance and participation at industry events

Work from home and earn up to £2,000 for every successful lead.

The role offers the opportunity to build a career in a high potential SaaS startup, and development into Business Development/Sales.
